author: Barb OC in CT

review: It's actually BETTER than a smart TV.  We bought a smart TV to get netflix, hulu, amazon, etc. and I am now using the fire stick with it.  Why? Because the terrible software updates and errors loading apps finally broke me.  I think every other time I turned my TV on, either an app wasn't working or an update needed to install.  RIDICULOUS.The fire stick is easy to use (my 4 yr old uses it), has an easy user-interface, and has all the basics apps on it to meet our needs.  We even took it with us to a hotel (perfect compact size to travel with) and signed into their internet and watched our shows on vacation.I would highly recommend this to anyone who has given up cable (which should be a majority of us by now ;) and is streaming their TV shows/movies on a regular basis.  My brother also figured out how to "unlock" his to do even more than it was intended too; I'm not quite savvy enough to do that yet.
